# include "samples/TrigInDetValidation_tau_sample0.xml"
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDArdict.exe
exeParamString TIDAdata11-rtt.dat -f data-tau-IBL.root -b Test_bin.dat
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-tau-IBL.root data-tau-IBL.root EF_tau29_IDTrkNoCut_IDT_InDetTrigParticleCreation_Tau_EFID EF_tau29_IDTrkNoCut_IDT_TrigFastTrackFinder_Tau -d EF-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-tau-merge.root data-tau-merge.root HLT_tau29_idperf_TrigFastTrackFinder_Tau HLT_tau29_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Tau_IDTrig HLT_tau29_tracktwo_idperf_TrigFastTrackFinder_TauCore HLT_tau29_tracktwo_idperf_TrigFastTrackFinder_TauIso HLT_tau29_tracktwo_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Tau_IDTrig -d HLTEF-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-tau-IBL.root data-tau-IBL-pu46-run2-reference-newchains.root HLT_tau29_idperf_TrigFastTrackFinder_Tau HLT_tau20_r1_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Tau_1 HLT_tau20_r1_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Tau_2 -d HLTL2-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-tau-IBL.root data-tau-IBL-pu46-run2-reference-newchains.root HLT_tau29_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Tau_EFID HLT_tau20_r1_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Tau_EFID --tag EFID -d HLTEF-plots
